name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Digital Deluxe Edition
storyline: The Giant Bonus Map: Zombies returns in all of its undead glory with "The Giant". Re-live the chaos of Treyarch's classic "Der Riese" Zombies map, picking up the Zombies story with Dempsey, Nikolai, Richtofen, and Takeo where Origins left off.
summary: Along with a downloadable copy of Call of Duty: Black Ops III, the Digital Deluxe Edition includes a Call of Duty: Black Ops III Season Pass giving you access to four epic DLC packs, access to The Giant Bonus Map for Call of Duty: Black Ops III Zombies, the downloadable Call of Duty: Black Ops III Personalization Pack, and the downloadable Weaponized 115 and Cyborg Personalization Packs.
